metadata.dc:author: López-Valenzuela, C
Figueroa, M
Rivera, S
metadata.dc:description: There is a wide variety of literature regarding chlorhexidine, so we have tried to put together the most recent studies in order to apply them to our clinical reality. Chlorhexidine is an excellent alternative which should be considered as the best chemical collaborator available in the market. In order to obtain the best therapeutic effects, chlorhexidine should always be used within a plaque control program administered by a professional. It's the best way to get the best advantages offered by this medicine.
metadata.dc:title: Alcances sobre la aplicación clínica de la clorhexidina.
[Clinical use of chlorhexidine].
